```{r}
#zip codes for state
data(zipcode)

#takes a value for state and returns all the zipcodes from the state
find_zips<-function(state_name){
  zip_holder<-zipcode%>%
    filter(state==state_name)%>%
    select(zip)
  zip_state<-as.vector(zip_holder)
  return(zip_state)
}
zip.ri<-find_zips("RI")
zip.ca<-find_zips("CA")
zip.nd<-find_zips("ND")


```
